content: Adds a visual editor for Class.AudioCompressor and Class.AudioLimiter instances.
Implements the tag, which lets you highlight text with a solid background. Supports the color and transparency attributes.
Adds new "ProductPurchaseChannel" field to the ProcessReceipt API with enums (Unknown, InExperience, ExperienceDetailsPage) to inform developers of the sale channel for the purchase.
New Explorer Beta - Adds back Ungroup button (will only show for models), and Select Parents/Select Children (which are now under Hierarchy).
Fixes issue in import queue where some errored files would not be deselected before import.
Reduces how long it takes to find the desired time position in a Class.VideoFrame.

• Fixes longstanding bug where networked CFrame rotations could exhibit 4x more deviation than expected.
  • Removes a restriction where networked CFrame positions were clamped to Â±1M studs.
Existing UGC characters no longer retarget animations, but new UGC characters support retargeting.
Sitting characters are no longer disconnected from their seats on remote clients that stream them out and back in again.
Beta Constraint Tool preserves existing initial attachments when using escape to cancel.
Fixes issue with camera zoom resetting.
Makes PlayerScripts controls enable/disable idempotent for consistent behavior.
Fixes a bug in Luau's type system where extending tables copied with table.clone would cause the types of both tables to be inaccurately combined.
Fixes a crash in OpenGL with Unified Lighting enabled.
Adds time limitation for improved pathfinding.
New Explorer Beta - Fixes scenario where having an open script editor breaks all shortcuts.
New Explorer Beta - Fixes clearing search not jumping to your selection if it was already expanded.
Cave generation in Terrain Editor now disabled by default.
